welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Bridgeton, the charming city known for its historic landmarks and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our beautiful city has to offer during your stay."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Millville Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Millville Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The oldest and smallest terminal at PHL, primarily used for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: The newest terminal at PHL, featuring modern amenities and a variety of dining options.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: The largest terminal at PHL, with a mix of domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal D
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at PHL, primarily used for international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal E
terminals.description: The international terminal at PHL, featuring a variety of duty-free shops and restaurants.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require a brief registration process.
